headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  FADEM, EDNA MAE

snippet: FADEM--Edna Mae. JBI International, Inc. (established in 1931 as The Jewish Braille Institute) deeply mourns the passing of Edna Mae Fadem, beloved wife of our devoted Board member and benefactor, Leroy Fadem, mother of former Board member, Steve Fadem, and sister of our long- time friend, Roy Raizen. Edna Mae was a most gracious and generous woman and will be sorely missed. Our thoughts are with the entire Fadem family. May her memory serve as a blessing. Judy E. Tenney, Co-Chairman of the Board Steven P. Polivy, Co-Chairman of the Board Dr. Ellen Isler, President & CEO Israel A. Taub, Vice-President & CFO 1/3

Edna Mae was a most gracious and generous woman and will be sorely missed. Our thoughts are with the entire Fadem family. May her memory serve as a blessing. Judy E.
